SELECT SI.STO_NUM, STO_NAME, STO_TEL, STO_OPEN, STO_CLOSE, STO_ADDR, STO_INTRO, ORD_LIMIT, DELI_TIME, ENTER_YN, OPEN_YN, DELIVERY, APRV_STATUS, SI.BRAND_CODE, B.BRAND_PIC, BRAND_NAME, AVG(REV_RATE) AS REV_RATE FROM STORE_INFO SI JOIN BRAND B ON SI.BRAND_CODE = B.BRAND_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN STORE_REVIEW SR ON SI.STO_NUM = SR.STO_NUM WHERE OPEN_YN='Y'
AND BRAND_NAME LIKE '%' || #{search_input} || '%'
AND STO_NAME LIKE '%' || #{search_input} || '%'
GROUP BY SI.STO_NUM, STO_NAME, STO_TEL, STO_OPEN, STO_CLOSE, STO_ADDR, STO_INTRO, ORD_LIMIT, DELI_TIME, ENTER_YN, OPEN_YN, DELIVERY, APRV_STATUS, SI.BRAND_CODE, B.BRAND_PIC, BRAND_NAME

SELECT STO_NUM, STO_NAME, BRAND_PIC, BRAND_NAME, REV_RATE FROM( SELECT S.STO_NUM, STO_NAME, BRAND_PIC, BRAND_NAME, SUM(ORD_PRICE), AVG(REV_RATE) AS REV_RATE FROM STORE_INFO S JOIN ORDER_PRO O ON S.STO_NUM = O.STO_NUM JOIN BRAND B ON S.BRAND_CODE = B.BRAND_CODE JOIN STORE_REVIEW SR ON S.STO_NUM = SR.STO_NUM GROUP BY S.STO_NUM, BRAND_PIC, STO_NAME, BRAND_NAME ORDER BY SUM(ORD_PRICE) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT SI.STO_NUM, STO_NAME, BRAND_PIC, BRAND_NAME, AVG(REV_RATE) AS REV_RATE FROM BRAND B JOIN STORE_INFO SI ON B.BRAND_CODE = SI.BRAND_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN STORE_REVIEW SR ON SI.STO_NUM = SR.STO_NUM WHERE B.BRAND_CODE = #{brand_code} GROUP BY SI.STO_NUM, STO_NAME, BRAND_PIC, BRAND_NAME

SELECT STO_NUM, STO_NAME, BRAND_PIC, BRAND_NAME, REV_RATE FROM( SELECT SL.STO_NUM, STO_NAME, BRAND_PIC, BRAND_NAME, AVG(REV_RATE) AS REV_RATE FROM STORE_LIKE SL JOIN STORE_INFO S ON SL.STO_NUM = S.STO_NUM JOIN BRAND B ON S.BRAND_CODE = B.BRAND_CODE JOIN STORE_REVIEW SR ON S.STO_NUM = SR.STO_NUM WHERE SL.USER_ID = #{id} GROUP BY SL.STO_NUM, STO_NAME, BRAND_PIC, BRAND_NAME )

SELECT SI.STO_NUM, STO_NAME, STO_TEL, STO_OPEN, STO_CLOSE, STO_ADDR, STO_INTRO, ORD_LIMIT, OPEN_YN, CEO_NAME, DELIVERY, BRAND_PIC, BRAND_NAME, M.MENU_NUM, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, MENU_PIC, MENU_EXP, CAT_CODE, SI.BRAND_CODE FROM STORE_INFO SI JOIN BRAND B ON SI.BRAND_CODE = B.BRAND_CODE JOIN MENU M ON B.BRAND_CODE = M.BRAND_CODE
WHERE SI.STO_NUM = #{sto_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE_INFO VALUES( SEQ_STO_NUM.NEXTVAL, #{sto_name}, #{sto_tel}, NULL, NULL, #{sto_addr}, #{sto_intro}, NULL, NULL, 'N', 'N', #{ceo_name}, #{delivery}, #{sto_email}, 'N', NULL, #{brand_code}, #{sto_lat}, #{sto_lng})
mapper.update: UPDATE STORE_INFO SET APRV_STATUS='Y', USER_ID=#{user_id} WHERE STO_NUM=#{sto_num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM STORE_INFO WHERE STO_ADDR LIKE '%'||#{sto_addr}||'%'
